channel.title: Equity - Dual Slayer|Achievements|Quests & More!
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://equityrsps.com/hslogo.png[/img]
[URL=http://equityrsps.com][IMG]http://i307.photobucket.com/albums/nn295/deven_053/3z9C4De.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://equityrsps.com/forum/misc.php?page=play][IMG]http://i307.photobucket.com/albums/nn295/deven_053/lNTi95Z.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://equityrsps.com/forum][IMG]http://i307.photobucket.com/albums/nn295/deven_053/oVbCCRg.png[/img][/URL]
Information
Duo Slayer 24 Working Competetive Skills We have a couple weapons with custom special attack's 13+ Bosses to fight 7+ Minigames to encounter 3 Quests to complete Dual Slayer with distance check and multiple tasks Dwarf Multicannon Handcannon Saving Teleports for quick access Slayer with boss tasks Armadyl battle-staff with crafting armadyl runes Full Ape Atoll access Completionist Cape Requirements (Hard) Max cape obtaining Variety of shops for starters 20+ Achievements to complete A High-scores to compete with the other players Prestige for points or ranks Full on organized quest book with clickable text (Statistics etc.)
Pictures
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Y6bIU2u.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YUw7tC2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Vp6KM2i.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fNoBLiL.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pOC3gKU.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/MXEzMcd.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FDX5eIv.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/EkOBPJe.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/G1DYrm9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/eETQAVI.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/D9zvdxK.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/JPHaJol.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PkoAv8n.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gya0JZh.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZnDKQMH.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WolZRnG.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PKMfiFP.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uHwuz2D.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SdomAMD.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5JLAiku.png[/img][/center]

item.title: Equity - Dual Slayer|Achievements|Quests & More!
item.dc:creator: @deven deven
item.description:
@deven wrote:

[quote=“nolan2131, post:3, topic:546046”]What’s with this duo slayer craze going on? It’s cool and all but everyone is doing it so much now that it’s not even unique anymore.[/quote] It’s amazing having a partner doing slayer
